name: C4D Woo Cart Popup & Slide – Boost Sell Collections
author: Coffee4dev.com

sections.description:
One of boost sales plugin from Coffee4Dev Team.

Plugin create popup cart or side cart to increase revenue as well as profitability for your website, stores.

Live Demo

  • Click to see live demo of C4D Woo Cart

FEATURES

  • Ajax Popup Cart
  • Ajax Side Cart
  • Call For Price for out of stock or empty price on single page
  • Sticky Add to Cart button on single page

PREMIUM FEATURE IN C4D Woocomemrce Ajax Popup Cart, Side Cart=

  • Update quantity in popup cart
  • Call For Price on archive page/ other
  • Custom call for price text
  • Side Cart on left side.
  • Responsive Mode

INSTALLATION & CONFIG

  1. Upload c4d-woo-cart-icon to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

OPTION PAGE

To enable admin options please install C4D Plugin Manager plugin

MAY BE YOU NEED

C4D Woo Variation Swatches Display variation by image, color, text. Support add multi images for variations.
C4D Woocommerce Bundle Create frequently bought together product, sell bundle products with discount, promotion
C4D Woocommerce Boost Sales Auto create upsell, cross-sell product in mini cart, cart page, popup cart, thankyou, email.
C4D Woocommerce Filter Turn your shop into ajax filter without refresh page. Support all default widget of Woocommerce.

NEED SUPPORT OR CUSTOM

If you have question please contact us. Visit plugin website
sections.installation:
1. Upload c4d-woo-cart-icon to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
